Info.mcpAddingDisabled: MCP server addition has been disabled by the administrator.
Info.vercelSyncDelay:
Running on Vercel

MCP changes may take 10-15 seconds to sync. Please wait a moment after adding, editing, or deleting servers if changes don't appear immediately.

Workflow.title: Workflow
Workflow.createWorkflowDescription: Create workflows as powerful tools for your chatbot.
Workflow.workflowDescription: These can be triggered during conversations to automate complex tasks.
Workflow.workflowNamePlaceholder: Chatbot will recognize this as tool name
Workflow.descriptionPlaceholder: Chatbot will see this as tool description
Workflow.draftDescription:
Currently in Draft.

Click Publish to make it available to chatbot
(but no longer editable).
Workflow.publishedDescription:
Currently Published and available to chatbot.

Click Draft to make it editable
(but unavailable to chatbot).
Workflow.privateDescription: Only you can view, edit, and use this workflow as a tool.
Workflow.readonlyDescription: Others can view and use as a tool, but only you can edit.
Workflow.publicDescription: Anyone can view, edit, and use this workflow as a tool.
Workflow.visibilityDescription: Control who can access and modify this workflow
Workflow.nextNodeDescription: Add a next node to this workflow.
Workflow.inputFieldsDescription:
Define the parameter schema for this workflow.

When the chatbot uses this as a tool,
it will provide values according to this schema.
Workflow.elseIfDescription: If the condition is not met, the logic to be executed is defined.
Workflow.elseDescription: If the condition is not met, the logic to be executed is defined.
Workflow.outputVariablesDescription: Output variables are the variables that are output from the workflow.
Workflow.messagesDescription:
Generate data through LLM processing.

Use '/' to mention and reference data from previous nodes as input.

With Structured Output enabled, perfect for data transformation, formatting, and validation.
Workflow.toolDescription:
Provide information needed for LLM to generate tool parameters.

Use '/' to mention data from previous nodes.
Workflow.generateInputWithAIDescription: Write a prompt to generate input for the workflow
Workflow.structuredOutputDescription: Generate response as JSON object with defined schema
Workflow.describeOutputDataRequest:
Provide example JSON data that represents what this node should output

Example: {eg}
Workflow.jsonSchemaEditorDescription: Direct JSON Schema editing with AI assistance. Supports complex nested structures and arrays.
Workflow.templateDescription:
Generate template documents.

Use '/' to reference and use output values from other nodes.

greeting.buildAutomationDescription: Connect various nodes to automate complex tasks. Each node handles specific functions, and data flows sequentially for processing.
greeting.chatbotToolDescription: The main purpose of workflows is to use them as tools in chatbot conversations. Turn repetitive tasks into workflows for easy execution during chats.
greeting.parameterBasedDescription: Input nodes define parameter structures, not triggers. They specify the data format needed when chatbot calls this workflow as a tool.
greeting.exampleDescription: Create an "Email Writing → Translation → Send" workflow, then easily execute it in chatbot conversations with "@email_workflow".
greeting.ctaMessage: Start creating workflows now to expand your chatbot's capabilities!

kindsDescription.input:
Define input parameters that the chatbot will provide when using this workflow as a tool.

Specify the data structure and validation rules for tool execution.
kindsDescription.output:
Collect and return the final results from your workflow execution.

Combine data from multiple nodes into the final tool response.
kindsDescription.llm:
Generate text or structured data using AI models.

Reference previous node outputs with '/' mentions to create context-aware responses.

Use Structured Output to transform, format, and validate data - not just for text generation.
kindsDescription.tool:
Execute MCP tools or external services.

Write instructions in messages, and LLM will generate the required tool parameters from your context.
kindsDescription.note:
Add documentation and comments to organize your workflow logic.

Help team members understand complex workflow processes.
kindsDescription.code:
Execute custom code scripts with access to previous node data.

Run JavaScript, Python, or other languages within your workflow (coming soon).
kindsDescription.http:
Fetch data from external APIs and web services via HTTP requests.

Integrate with REST APIs, webhooks, and third-party services.
kindsDescription.template:
Create dynamic documents by combining text with data from previous nodes.

Generate emails, reports, or formatted content using variable substitution.
kindsDescription.condition:
Add conditional logic to branch your workflow based on data evaluation.

Create if-else logic to handle different scenarios and data conditions.

Workflow.structuredOutputSwitchConfirm:
You currently have structured output enabled.
 What would you like to do?
Workflow.noTools:
No published workflows available.
Create workflows to build custom tools.

SignIn.title: Welcome Back
SignIn.description: Sign in to continue to your account

SignUp.title: Create an account
SignUp.step1: Start your journey with us by entering your email address
SignUp.step2: I'll use this name when we chat
SignUp.step3: Create a strong password to secure your account

Intro.description: Welcome to better-chatbot. Sign in to experience our AI-powered conversational tools.

Chat.thisMessageWasNotSavedPleaseTryTheChatAg: This message was not saved. Please try the chat again.

Greeting.whatAreYouWorkingOnToday: What are you working on today? {name}
Greeting.letMeKnowWhenYoureReadyToBegin: Let me know when you're ready to begin.
Greeting.whereWouldYouLikeToStart: Where would you like to start?

TemporaryChat.feelFreeToAskAnythingTemporarily: Feel free to ask anything temporarily
TemporaryChat.temporaryChatInstructionsDescription: You can set instructions for the temporary chat. This will be used as a system prompt for the temporary chat.

Tool.toolsSetupDescription:
Select tools that the chatbot can use.
The chatbot will use selected tools based on its own judgment.

You can also force the use of specific tools through @mention.
Tool.autoToolModeDescription: Decides when to use tools without asking you
Tool.manualToolModeDescription: Asks your permission before using any tools
Tool.noneToolModeDescription: Do not use tools. @mention is still available.
Tool.saveAsPresetDescription: Save the current tool configuration as a preset.
Tool.clickSaveAsPresetToGetStarted: Click Save As Preset to get started.
Tool.searchOptionsDescription: You can pass search options to the chatbot, such as the maximum number of search results, the search date, etc.

VoiceChat.title: Voice Chat Mode
VoiceChat.pleaseCloseTheVoiceChatAndTryAgain: Please close the voice chat and try again.
VoiceChat.readyWhenYouAreJustStartTalking: Ready when you are—just start talking.

Thread.confirmDeleteUnarchivedChats: Are you sure you want to delete all unarchived chats?
Thread.areYouSureYouWantToDeleteThisChatThread: Are you sure you want to delete this Chat thread?

ChatPreferences.title: Chat Preferences
ChatPreferences.whatPersonalPreferencesShouldBeTakenInto: What personal preferences should be taken into account in responses?
ChatPreferences.responseStyleExample1: e.g. keep explanations brief and to the point
ChatPreferences.responseStyleExample2: e.g. when learning new concepts, I find analogies particularly helpful
ChatPreferences.responseStyleExample3: e.g. ask clarifying questions before giving detailed answers
ChatPreferences.responseStyleExample4: e.g. remember I primarily code in Python (not a coding beginner)
ChatPreferences.userInstructionsDescription: Introduce yourself and get a more personalized response.

Layout.createYourOwnAgent: Create your own specialized AI agent with unique features and personality
Layout.createYourOwnAgentOrSelectShared: Create your own specialized AI agent or select from shared agents in the Agents page
Layout.agentDescription: Agents are specialized AI assistants that can be customized with specific roles, instructions, and tools to help you with various tasks.
Layout.specializedAIAssistantDescription: Each agent can be customized with specific roles, personalities, and expertise areas to provide focused assistance for your unique needs.
Layout.customInstructionsDescription: Define detailed system prompts and behavioral guidelines to shape how your agent responds and interacts with you.
Layout.toolIntegrationDescription: Connect your agents to MCP servers, workflows, and other tools to extend their capabilities beyond conversation.
Layout.businessAssistantDescription: Specialized in business analysis, report generation, and professional communication.
Layout.creativeWriterDescription: Focused on storytelling, content creation, and creative brainstorming.
Layout.technicalExpertDescription: Equipped with development tools and coding expertise for technical tasks.
Layout.createFirstAgentToStart: Create your first agent to get started!

Archive.title: Archive
Archive.archiveDescriptionPlaceholder: Archives are spaces to store chat history.
Archive.confirmDeleteArchive: Are you sure you want to delete this archive?
Archive.deleteArchiveDescription: This archive and all its items will be permanently deleted. This action cannot be undone.

Agent.title: Agent
Agent.agentNameAndIconLabel: Give your agent a name and icon.
Agent.agentDescriptionLabel: Add a brief description of what this agent does.
Agent.agentDescriptionPlaceholder: This is just a description of the agent, it's not critical.
Agent.agentSettingsDescription: From here, these are settings that can affect the agent.
Agent.thisAgentIs: This agent is an expert in
Agent.agentInstructionsLabel: Feel free to write the agent's role, personality, guidelines, knowledge, etc.
Agent.agentInstructionsPlaceholder: This agent helps with stock analysis. It uses web search tools to obtain stock information...
Agent.agentToolsLabel: Add tools that this agent can use.
Agent.generateAgentGreeting: Hello! I'll help you create your own agent. What would you like to create?
Agent.generateAgentDetailedGreeting: Hello! I'll help you create your own agent. What would you like to create? You can write briefly or in detail.
Agent.createFirst: Create your first agent to get started
Agent.noSharedAgentsDescription: No public agents are available to bookmark
Agent.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this agent?
Agent.privateDescription: Only you can view, edit, and use this agent.
Agent.readOnlyDescription: Others can view and use as a tool, but only you can edit.
Agent.publicDescription: Anyone can view, edit, and use this agent as a tool.

MCP.configureYourMcpServerConnectionSettings: Configure your MCP server connection settings
MCP.nameMustContainOnlyAlphanumericCharacter: Name must contain only alphanumeric characters (A-Z, a-z, 0-9) and hyphens (-)
MCP.overviewDescription: Add MCP servers to unlock powerful AI integrations
MCP.enterPromptToGenerateExampleInputJSON: Enter a prompt to generate example input JSON for the selected tool.
MCP.serverCustomInstructionsPlaceholder: These lines will be added to the AI system prompt whenever a tool from this server is available.
MCP.toolCustomizationInstructions:
Tool customization instructions will be added to the system prompt when the tool is available.
example) Always enter the email in the format example@example.com.
MCP.mcpServerCustomizationDescription: MCP server customization instructions will be added to the system prompt when the MCP server is available.
MCP.toolCustomizationInstructionsPlaceholder: Tool customization instructions are not available.
MCP.mcpServerCustomizationPlaceholder: eg. If the input value is email, always enter the email in the format example@example.com.
